related_questions.question:
A fish live on the....
Tolong bantu jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

water

sea

ocean

dead sea

lakes

Penjelasan:

intinya ikan hidup di dalam air brother

a fish lives on the…
artinya: “ikan hidup di…”

ikan hidup dimana? laut/danau/sungai/delta/kolam/muara

karena banyak banget kita pilih yang paling umum aja ya, laut

laut bahasa inggrisnya sea

jadi jawabanya…

“a fish lives on the sea”

related_questions.question: What do you think about social media for the student

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

What do you think about social media for the students?

I think social media can be good or bad for students. Social media is good for students if they are able to filter bad information for their benefits. But, social media is bad for students if they keep consuming hoax, hate speech and all those negative contents on social media. The choice is yours!

Penjelasan:

Aku berpendapat bahwa media sosial bisa baik atau buruk bagi para siswa. Media sosial baik untuk para siswa jika mereka mampu menyaring informasi buruk demi keuntungan mereka. Tetapi, media sosial buruk bagi para pelajar jika mereka terus mengkonsumsi hoax, ujaran kebencian dan semua konten negatif di media sosial. Pilihan ada padamu!

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
(Sco    Mr. Ringo : Who is the best chef in your family?
Penny
Mr. ringo Really? I thought your father don't know how to cook!​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Mr. Ringo : Who is the best chef in your family?

Penny: My father is the best chef in my family.

Mr. ringo Really? I thought your father doesn't know how to cook!​

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Simple Present Tense karena menjelaskan tentang fakta.

Simple Present Tense:

Nominal: (+) Subject + tobe (is/am/are) + Noun (kata benda)

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question: Kenapa makan daging babi haram klo ayam tidak? ​
Bantu jawab ya kaka kaka please​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

  1. saw
  2. went
  3. invited
  4. made
  5. bought
  6. didn't
  7. told
  8. gave
  9. took
  10. watch

Penjelasan:

Jadi, past tense itu tenses yang menjelaskan kalimat di masa lampau, verbs dalam soal tinggal dijadiin bentuk past atau V2.

CMIIW ✨
